channel.title: Clyde's Weird Stuff
channel.description: Weird things that interest Clyde. Well maybe not that weird, you decide!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Various Interesting Shows
channel.itunes:author: Clyde J. Kell
channel.itunes:summary: Weird things that interest Clyde. Well maybe not that weird, you decide!

item.title: Banana Oil Episode 15
item.description:
My sincere apologies for not publishing any Banana Oil episodes in a while! Where has the time gone? Well give Banana Oil episode 15 a listen. I'm sure you'll be pleased. Theme, Love and Marriage, includes a 1950's radio game show called Rate Your Mate, plus a few tunes from the Podsafe Music Network. Thank you for visiting our sponsors. WebRadioWorld.com Streaming services. GoToMeeting.comFree 45 Day Try.
GoDaddy.comWeb hosting, domain names.

item.title: Banana Oil Episode 14
item.description:
Another episode featuring the Lonesome Gal, well sort of.... With some slight modifications. Give it a listen, however it is advised that you do not operate machinery while listening. More comedy music from the Podsafe Music Network and some real old tunes from the internet. Enjoy! Sponsored by: GoToMeeting.comFree 45 Day Try.

item.title: Banana Oil Episode 13
item.description:
Banana Oil episode 13 presents The Lonesome Gal, circa 1951. In the late 40's a sultry female radio voice stopped male listeners in their tracks. Listen to Jean King coo, and woo her way with you. Soft porn, on the radio from the late 40's. Background intro music is from the Harry James Orch, Cherry 1944, and two comedy songs from the Podsafe Music Network Please visit our sponsors in support of these podcasts. GoToMeeting.comFree 45 Day Try.
GoDaddy.comWeb hosting, domain names, blogs, e-mail, your full service provider.

item.title: Banana Oil Episode 12
item.description:
More silly adult parody tunes, or party records as they called them years ago. Some modern tunes from the Podsafe Music Network and Internet Archive.org and various early 1900's music resources. Sit back and enjoy! Please visit our sponsors. GoToMeeting.comFREE Try 45 days.

item.title: NTW 05-04-2007 Episode 2 of 3
item.description:
Now THATs Weird hosted by Ross Hemsworth aired May 04, 2007 presents Geoff Richardson in episode two, he has had a lifelong interest in UFOs since his first sighting of a triangular craft as a ten year old child. A further, convincing sighting of a UFO in June 1996 re-affirmed his opinion that these objects are worthy of study. Support these podcasts with your visit to our sponsors. GoToMeeting.com45 Day FREE Try.
GoDaddy.comYour web solutions provider.

item.title: NTW 05-04-2007 Episode 1 of 3
item.description:
Now Thats Weird with Ross Hemsworth aired May 4, 2007 presents. Peter Knight, He believes in personal experiential interaction with the landscape and its sacred sites. He advocates that by seeking out the ancient wisdom inherent at sacred places we can profoundly enhance our lives today. Please visit our sponsors. GoToMeeting.comFREE for 45 days.
GoDaddy.comWeb hosting and domain names.

item.title: NWT 04-2-2007 Episode 3 of 3
item.description:
Now Thats Weird with Ross Hemsworth aired April 27 2007. Ross talks with Simon Gray the founders of the world's largest conspiracy theory site and discussion forum ABOVE TOP SECRET. The ATS forums contain some amazing theories, discussions and evidence of everything from UFO's and aliens to ghost and the paranormal. Please visit our sponsors. GoToMeeting.comTry it for 45 days FREE.
GoDaddy.comYour web hosting and domain name service provider.

item.title: Banana Oil Episode 11
item.description: Place those ear buds in deep for Banana Oil episode 11, lots of belly laughs with some new and old parody tunes. If you're quick to offend you better turn off your mp3 player now. Most of the music provided by the Podsafe Music Network and the trash dumpster of the internet! This podcast is sponsored by GoToMeeting.com Give it a try for 45 days FREE

item.title: Tip Jar Donation Request
item.description: Thank you for listening to the Weird-Stuff podcasts. There are a lot of you out there. So my bandwidth usage is getting expensive. Visit my Weird-Stuff Podcast Page Click on the PayPal button. A couple of dollar's would be very much appreciated. Regards, Clyde J. Kell

item.title: Banana Oil Episode 7
item.description: Welcome to the world of Old Time Radio, with episode seven of Banana Oil we listen to the Chase and Sanborn show of Dec 12, 1937 starring Mae West, Don Ameche and Edgar Bergen. This broadcast was very much adult themed and actually got Mae West Banned from radio for 37 years. Mystery Play Internet Radio

item.title: Banana Oil Episode 1
item.description: Banana Oil is what I call a lot of things that just annoy me, or that I find funny in a weird way. Give it a listen and you'll hear what I mean. Mystery Play Internet Radio
